comment._content: The National Archive of Australia has his digitised service record here: recordsearch.naa.gov.au/NameSearch/Interface/ItemsListing... THORN Reginald Samuel Service Number - 3621 Place of Birth - Cavanagh SA Place of Enlistment - Adelaide SA Next of Kin - (Mother) THORN Mary Ann The Australia Birth Index on Ancestry states Name:Reginald Samuel Thorn Birth Date:24 Aug 1888 Father's Name:John Samuel Thorn Mother's name:Mary Ann Bishop Birth Place:Thornton Registration Place:Frome, South Australia
